profile.introduction: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a strong background in **blockchain technology** and software engineering. I love building scalable web applications and exploring new technologies.

timelineItems.description:
Led development of secure, decentralized financial primitives on the Bitcoin network.
Optimized layer-2 transaction efficiency for faster confirmation times.
Implemented multi-signature protocols to enhance asset security.
Drove open-source collaboration within the Bitcoin ecosystem.

Developed and maintained high-scale e-commerce platform features.
Focused on performance optimization for core shopping cart functionality.
Integrated several new global payment gateways using Ruby on Rails and React.

Contributed to the CUDA platform, optimizing kernel performance.
Developed testing frameworks for parallel processing systems in C++.
Implemented data visualization tools for internal GPU usage metrics.
Intensive coding bootcamp focused on full-stack development and startup skills.
Comprehensive computer science education with focus on software engineering and algorithms.

hero.description: I build interactive web apps using [TECH_LIST]. With a focus on **UI** design. Enthusiastic about **SAAS**, driven by a keen eye for building product.

projects.title: Chat Collect
projects.description: A SaaS to collect email addresses from your GPT users via the OpenAI GPT Store. Great for building an audience and monetizing API usage.

projects.title: Magic UI
projects.description: Designed, developed and sold animated UI components for developers, focusing on modern web aesthetics and performance.

projects.title: AI Content Generator
projects.description: A powerful SaaS application that uses AI to generate content for various use cases. Built with modern tech stack and optimized for performance.

projects.title: Design System
projects.description: Comprehensive design system with reusable components and documentation. Helping teams maintain design consistency across projects.
